io.github.dfx81.database

Class DBManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.dfx81.database.DBManager

  • public class DBManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all database interactions. Uses JDBC-SQLite as a driver.

    • Constructor Summary

      The base constructor.

      • getStudentData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getStudentData(int matricno)
        Get the data from the student's matric no.
        Parameters:
        matricno - The matric no of the student.
        Returns:
        The list of data from the student. Can return multiple data.

      • getStudentData

        public java.lang.String[] getStudentData(java.lang.String projectId)
        Get the student data related to a specific project.
        Parameters:
        projectId - The project id of the project to access.
        Returns:
        A single data about the student specific to the project.

      • getSupervisorData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getSupervisorData(int staffno)
        Get the data based on the supervisor's staff no. Can return multiple supervisors.
        Parameters:
        staffno - The staff no. of the record to access.
        Returns:
        The list of supervisors data.

      • getSupervisorData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getSupervisorData(java.lang.String name)
        Get the data specific to a supervisor based on their name. Only returns a single supervisor.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the supervisor.
        Returns:
        The data about a specific supervisor.

      • addRecords

        public void addRecords(java.util.ArrayList<Student> students,

                       java.util.ArrayList<Project> projects)
        Add a list of students, supervisors, and projects to the database.
        Parameters:
        students - The list of students to be added.
        supervisors - The list of supervisors to be added.
        projects - The list of projects to be added.

      • updateBotData

        public void updateBotData()
        Update the bot info. Mainly used to update the database version after each scheduled update.
